testcase.name: User searches and views a product
testcase.system-out: When the user enters the product name in the search field...................passed And presses the Enter key...................................................passed Then the search results should display the product name, category Hobi and price Rp 8.000.000.passed

testcase.name: User clicks the product to open the product page
testcase.system-out: When the user clicks on the desired product from the search results.........passed Then the user is redirected to the product details page.....................passed And the product is submitted with valid information Elektronik, Rp 5.000.000, Used laptop, Seller QA Group 03 Wave 10, Jakarta.passed
